cause.description:
There are many many many people living with kids and are unable to support themselves and their kids. Some of these children are abandonded. If the parents didn't have children in the first place they wouldn't have to be faced with the situation.
The world is also becoming overpopulated which puts added pressure on the environment.
The use condoms and other contraceptive methods can and will prevent this.
Make contraception freely available everywhere.
1. Decrease the amount of orphans and homeless children.
2. Prevent teenage pregnancy.
3. Make contaception freely available
cause.mission: Decrease the amount of orphans and homeless children. Prevent teenage pregnancy. Stop overpopulation. Make people aware. Make contraception freely available
cause.name: Use contraception - less orphans and teenage pregnancy. Stop overpopulation
